com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.region

Class OrthonormalConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.region.OrthonormalConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrustRegion

    public class OrthonormalConstraint
extends Object
implements TrustRegion
    This constraint ensures that the L2 magnitude of the weight evalInputDelta cannot exceed a simple threshold. A simpler version of AdaptiveTrustSphere, it places a limit on the step size for a given key.
